title: Research
text:
Projects

The 19th century sugar cartel in Austria-Hungary (joint with Nikolaus Fink, Philipp Schmidt-Dengler, and Christine Zulehner)
Consumer inertia and switching behavior (part of DFG group “Consumer Preferences, Consumer Mistakes, and Firms’ response”, Uni Vienna PI Christine Zulehner, Frankfurt School PI Heiko Karle, project leader Paul Heidhues)

title: Moritz Schwarz
text: Moritz Schwarz · PhD Candidate · University of Vienna. I am a PhD candidate in Economics at the University of Vienna. My research interests include Empirical Industrial Organization and Competition Economics.
